header: Test if your server's votifier is working by just filling out the information below
descp1: Votifier Tester helps you determine if the Votifier plugin has been correctly installed in your Minecraft server.
descp2: Votifier is a Minecraft server voting plugin you can install to get notified whenever a player votes for your server on a server list, like Crafty.
descp3: Votifier is used by server owners / admins to reward players who vote for their Minecraft server. Voting helps the server get a better ranking on server lists.
